writer.name: 珍妮弗·里昂·贝尔 Jennifer Lyon Bell

director.name: 珍妮弗·里昂·贝尔 Jennifer Lyon Bell

introduction: Stage actors Mariah and Daniel play lovers every night, but their onstage romance lacks spark. One slow afternoon, they discover that today's matinée performance will make or break both their careers. Daniel wants to make big changes, and Mariah starts to wonder: are Daniel's suggestions reasonable? Or has he lost track of the boundary between actor and character? Rushed to the stage, in front of a live audience, they must figure it out together.by imdb
